url.description: New for 2016! Connect(); is back. Join us November 16th - 18th, 2016Connect(); is back for 2016! Join us November 16th for a virtual live stream with Scott Guthrie, Scott Hanselman, and several other

video:video.video:title: Improve Your Code Quality Using Live Code Analyzers
video:video.video:description: Live Code Analyzers are used to add custom error messages and warnings that appear live as you're typing, along with automatic code fixes to help you clean them up. They are available as NuGet&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Using Smart Unit Tests To Find Bugs Earlier In The Development Cycle
video:video.video:description: Smart Unit Tests help you find bugs earlier in the development cycle. See how this Microsoft Research project walks through code paths of existing applications to create these new unit tests.

video:video.video:title: What's New In .NET 2015

video:video.video:title: Tools For Integrating Testers Into A DevOps World

video:video.video:title: Opening Session

video:video.video:description: As a Web Developer today you have many opportunities to create some amazing websites and services. Weather its updating an existing site to support responsive design, creating a new single page&#8230;

video:video.video:description: If you're a developer you know that Programming languages and frameworks are at the core of any software project. Join us for a panel discussion with the managed languages and .NET product teams on&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Live Q&A with Brian Harry
video:video.video:description: Brian Keller talks with technical fellow Brian Harry about software engineering practices and running software projects in a DevOps world

video:video.video:title: Live Q&A with S. "Soma" Somasegar
video:video.video:description: Dan Fernandez talks with Soma about upcoming news and features for the next version of Visual Studio.

video:video.video:title: Live Q&A with Scott Guthrie
video:video.video:description: Dan Fernandez sits down with Scott Guthrie to discuss what's next for developers in the mobile-first, cloud-first era.

video:video.video:title: Evolving software engineering practices
video:video.video:description: Software is eating the world and being Agile is becoming a requirement just to stay in business regardless of the industry you are in. The agility gained by development needs to be extended to IT Ops&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Cloud development with Azure and Visual Studio
video:video.video:description: Learn how to extend your applications with Azure and ASP.NET vNext to take advantage of the cloud, and embrace new scenarios that unlock unlimited possibilities for your applications.

video:video.video:title: Visual Studio in a world of multiple devices
video:video.video:description: Get a deeper look on the next version of Visual Studio, and the innovation delivered to help you modernize existing applications faster and create new ones targeting multiple devices.

video:video.video:title: Keynote: Developers in the mobile-first, cloud-first era
video:video.video:description: Learn about Microsoft's vision for developer platforms, tools and technologies that brings developers to the center of the mobile-first, cloud-first era.
